Package edu.missouri.bayesianConstructor

Contains classes to automatically build a Bayesian Network.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DomainKnowledge
    Stores information pertinent to the domain knowledge.
    Main
    Provides a sample program that creates a Bayesian Network from economic data and stores it in an XML BIF file.
    NodePlacer
    The NodePlacer class computes the best placement for the given node on the canvas on which its graph is displayed.

Package edu.missouri.bayesianConstructor Description

Contains classes to automatically build a Bayesian Network. Typical usage is to create a model of the DomainKnowledge, export this into a BeliefNetwork (from SamIam), and then train or evaluate the belief network representation using methods from another package. The programmer is encouraged to try exporting the Domain Knowledge model into other structures, but no support for them is provided in this package at the present time.
Version:
0.16 2016-04-09

Version history

Ver# date Changes
0.16 2016-04-09 Added DomainKnowledge#layerMap() to allow callers to use both Main#graphToNetwork methods securely (DomainKnowledge is now version 1.04)
0.15 2016-04-08 Added Main#graphToNetwork(edu.ucla.structure.DirectedGraph, String[], java.util.Map, char, double) to allow the caller to specify the parameters of the NodePlacer to use. (Main is now version 0.09)
0.14 2016-03-30 Fixed NodePlacer#STAR mode. NodePlacer is now version 1.4.
0.13 2016-03-29 Fixed NodePlacer#GEOMETRIC mode. NodePlacer is now version 1.3.
0.12 2016-03-29 Fixed NodePlacer#LAYERED mode. NodePlacer is now version 1.2.
0.11 2016-03-29 Added NodePlacer#ASTERISK mode after a happy accident. NodePlacer is now version 1.1.
0.10 2016-03-29 Added NodePlacer to help ouputted files be more readable in SamIam viewer. Main is now version 0.08.
0.09 2016-03-21 Main#main(String[]) now receives output file as a parameter (Main is now version 0.07)
0.08 2016-03-21 Fixed Main#graphToNodeGraph(edu.ucla.structure.DirectedGraph, String[]) to account for hashing order and BeliefNetwork limitations (Main is now version 0.06)
0.07 2016-03-20 Added Main#graphToNodeGraph(edu.ucla.structure.DirectedGraph, String[]) to follow SamIam conventions (Main is now version 0.05)
0.06 2016-03-19 Fixed Main#dependency(java.util.List, java.util.List) which was not ignoring null values correctly (Main is now version 0.04)
0.05 2016-03-18 Added added CSV support to Main#Main() through openCSV (now version 0.03)
0.04 2016-03-17 Fixed Main#dependency(java.util.List, java.util.List) which was not ignoring null values correctly; and brought DomainKnowledge up to version 1.03, improving handling of uninitialized dependency tables.
0.03 2016-03-15 added Main (version 0.01) and debugged DomainKnowledge#variableDependency(Double) (DomainKnowledge is now version 1.02)
0.02 2016-03-14 added DomainKnowledge#variableDependency(Double) (DomainKnowledge is now version 1.01)
0.01 2016-03-13 DomainKnowledge version 1.0 finalized
0.00 2016-02-03 Package created
Author:
Fernando J. Torre-Mora
